dcterms:description: The Taiwan credit dataset contains 30000 data samples with 24 variables to be used in a binary classification task to predict customersâ€™ loan default. After using dummy variables for categorical features, the final dataset has 33 variables including the target value. The imbalance ratio of the Taiwan dataset is 3.52.
dcterms:title: Taiwan Credit Data

dcterms:description: The Lending Club dataset consists of loans with the payback duration of either 36 or 60 months. The final dataset contains 206732 samples with 82 variables, including the target value of loan status. The imbalance ratio of the dataset was calculated as 5.98.
dcterms:title: Lending Club Dataset
